graph_title: Mortality rate attributed to unintentional poisoning
indicator_name: Mortality rate attributed to unintentional poisoning
SDG_GOAL: Goal 3: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG_TARGET: Target 3.9: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 3.9.3: Mortality rate attributed to unintentional poisoning
STAT_CONC_DEF: The mortality rate attributed to unintentional poisoning as defined as the number of deaths of unintentional poisonings in a year, divided by the population, and multiplied by 100 000.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 3: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 3.9: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 3.9.3: Mortality rate attributed to unintentional poisoning
